name: Escape From Prison Multiplayer
summary: Escape From Prison Multiplayer is a thrilling multiplayer platformer game where your mission is to make a daring escape from prison! Customize your brave little mouse and race against time to break out. Each room you conquer brings you closer to freedom, but watch out for the dangerous traps and obstacles in your way! Can you outsmart the prison's challenges and make a successful escape? Test your skills and find out if you have what it takes to flee from prison!
